title: Poppy support botlane?
body: How do you counter this? Like i've been against and with it, and it's honestly nasty. If you havn't tried it, get a poppy main and tell them to come bot lane with  you. I've first experienced it 6 months ago and it still a nasty underground op thing. (All you do as poppy is ram them into the walls of botlane)

replies.body: It is a low ELO thing for abusing those supports (and ADCs) that think they need to live in the brush. Works hilariously well when they do, but poorly if they understand how to to wreck themselves. Great ability to deny engage or ganks, though
Thanks for the information i already know, what's the counter now?

> [{quoted}](name=2N Toxicity,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hwAeF9oG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-04-12T18:15:14.983+0000)
>
> Thanks for the information i already know, what's the counter now?

Dont camp bush.

The only time I play {{champion:78}} is when I have a {{champion:67}} as my adc. 

MUHAHAHAHA

Better yet. {{champion:67}} {{champion:83}} use those walls baby.

It's a niche thing that can work against some dash heavy comps. 

Very reliant on actually getting wall stuns though, which against decent opposing laners will be unlikely to happen short of you flashing for the stun angle, and that's a big commitment for just a stun. If you're forcing plays with flash theres plenty of other strong bot lane choices.
